page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: We have done a survey of {employment. In our area.Very few people are employed in this area.There aren't any factories in our area and most people have to go out of our area to work. Farmers are one of the few groups who don't have to go out of our area to work.I have found that in 1 square kilometere of our area grid reference 26,33 that 9 people are retired.There are 4 teachers, 2 people that work at British Telecom, 2 lorry drivers, 1 publican, 1 civil servant, 1 plasterer 1 t.v. shop owner, 1 lecturer, 1 coach operater, 1 army officer, 1 rector, 1 nurse, 1 plumber, 1 joiner,2 builders, 1 clerk, 1 salesman, and 1 riding stable owner.The square I did my survey in was 26,33 and this is the most densley populated square in our 12 sqaure kilometre area.
